The following entities do not clearly refer to "Material property":

* "high" (it is an adjective used to describe the hole mobility, not a property name)
* "balanced" (it is an adjective used to describe the hole mobility, not a property name)
* "PBDT-TDPP-S" (it is a material name, not a property name)
* "devices" (it is a general term, not a property name)
* "FF level" (it is a property name, but it is not a material property, but rather a property of a device)
